summary: Marcurio as a frost/resto mage with stealth perks.
descriptionHtml:
This mod requires only the base game. All screenshots show Marcurio with Geonox's High Res Face Maps- Smooth option.  Any body/face mods will be fully compatible. *Includes FaceGen data so there will be no grey face bugs.

-Marcurio has the best follower AI in the game for a mage, he deserved a full reboot.

[u][b]Marcurio Follower Overhaul Basics[/b][/u]
*Now a frost/resto mage.
*Will not trigger pressure plates & has stealth perks.
*AutoLevel 5-81.  He remains balanced as in the vanilla game.
*Marcurio is now set to Essential.
*Half casting cost for all spells included but with no damage boosting perks.
*He has no spells that will generate friendly fire and get you killed.

[u][b]Stats & Spells[/b][/u]
*He remains balanced for vanilla gameplay because he starts with his regular base game stats and will level up exactly the way J'zargo does in the base game. 
*His spells include: Healing & Frostbite at low levels, Ice Spike & Fast Healing at midlevels, Close Wounds & Icy Spear at high levels.

[u][b]Perks Included[/b][/u]
*His perks include Half Cost for casting all of his spells to keep him productive and busy during long fights and to ensure that he doesn't get in your way trying to melee if he runs out of mana.
*He has all stealth perks and Lightfoot to prevent him from starting a fight before you or triggering pressure plates.

[u][b]Cosmetic Changes- Hair, clothing & facial features[/b][/u]
*He now wears a version of Fine Clothes. This means he will equip any enchanted robes or any armor you give him.
*His face has been tweaked to provide a Marcurio you'd actually Want to marry! 

[u][b]Recommended Mod:[/b][/u]
"High Res Face Maps for Men" by Geonox with "Optional Smooth Maps"
author: FaeSky
